title: Teraria
info: In order to play on our server first you need to download the same version of Teraria that the server has then you need to download Zero Tier from your IOS or Play store. Open your Zero Tier then paste the code below to connect to the server then open teraria and paste the server ID then play.

title: Mobile Legends Bang Bang
info: In order to play with me first you need to download mlbb then create a account then add me.

title: Honkai Impact 3rd
info: In order to play with me first you need to download honkai then select America in your server selection then add me.
